column1: '''Kurúki''' was an evil magician in a preliminary sketch of the tale of ''[[Turambar and the Foalókë]]''. When [[Nienor
column3: Mavwin]] (at that point named ''Vainóni'' and ''Tirannë'') stumble upon him, he gives them a drink which causes them to forget their names and wander distraught in the woods.<ref>{{LT2
